name: GKLinearCongruentialRandomSource
desc: A basic random number generator implementing the linear congruential generator algorithm, which is faster but less random than the default random source.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Initializes a random source from a nondeterministic seed.

items.name: init(seed: UInt64)
items.desc: Initializes a random source with the specified seed value.
